name: Vegan Bombay Potatoes and Peas
description: Vegan Bombay potatoes and Peas Recipe. Ready in 30 minutes. How to make Easy Potato Pea Curry. Add greens, use sweet potato for variation. Vegan Glutenfree Indian Recipe Serves 3 to 4

video.name: Bombay Potatoes & Peas - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Vegan Bombay Potatoes and Peas Recipe. Ready in 30 minutes. 
Recipe --- http://www.veganricha.com/2015/09/vegan-bombay-potatoes-and-peas.html

How to make Easy Potato Pea Curry. Add greens, use sweet potato for variation. Vegan Glutenfree Indian Recipe Serves 3 to 4

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp cayenne/ red chili powder  (or to taste)
1 cup peas (fresh or thawed if frozen)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add cumin and mustard seeds. Cook until the cumin seeds change color.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add cumin and mustard seeds. Cook until the cumin seeds change color.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions, mix and cook until translucent. 5 to 6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions, mix and cook until translucent. 5 to 6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend the tomato, garlic and ginger into a coarse puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend the tomato, garlic and ginger into a coarse puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomato puree and spices to the pan. Cook until the puree thickens and garlic smells roasted. 5 to 6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomato puree and spices to the pan. Cook until the puree thickens and garlic smells roasted. 5 to 6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes, salt and water. Cover and cook for 10 to 11 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes, salt and water. Cover and cook for 10 to 11 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the peas, taste and adjust salt and spice. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for another 10 to 12 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked to preference. Add water if the potatoes start to stick or if you prefer more curry.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the peas, taste and adjust salt and spice. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for another 10 to 12 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked to preference. Add water if the potatoes start to stick or if you prefer more curry.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the cilantro. Add some lemon juice if needed. Taste ad adjust salt and spice. Mix in. Serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix in the cilantro. Add some lemon juice if needed. Taste ad adjust salt and spice. Mix in. Serve hot.

recipeInstructions.text: * If making this with boiled potatoes. Add cubed potatoes, salt, 1/4 cup water and peas at step 5, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the cilantro and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: * If making this with boiled potatoes. Add cubed potatoes, salt, 1/4 cup water and peas at step 5, cover and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the cilantro and serve.

keywords: bombay aloo, bombay potato recipe, bombay potatoes and peas, vegan bombay potatoes
